summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CivicConnect Smart Community Issue Reporting System. Backend APIs are fully functional (13/13 tests passed). Frontend loads correctly with minor UI interaction issues in dropdown selections.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selections require keyboard navigation instead of mouse clicks due to overlay issues
403 Forbidden error when submitting reports from frontend (CORS or authentication issue)

integration_issues.issue: Frontend report submission returns 403 error despite backend API working correctly

high_priority: Fix 403 Forbidden error in frontend report submission - check CORS configuration and request headers
Investigate dropdown selection overlay issues in Select components
medium_priority: Improve dropdown accessibility for better mouse interaction
Add error handling for geolocation failures
low_priority: Consider adding loading states for form submissions
